metadata.title: CVE-2022-36879 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.18.14.xfrm_expand_policies in net/xfrm/xfrm_policy.c can cause a refcount to bedropped twice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-36879` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-50-generic - 5.15.0-50.56
linux-image-5.15.0-50-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-50.56
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-50-generic - 5.15.0-50.56
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-50-generic-64k - 5.15.0-50.56
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-kvm - 5.15.0-1019.23
No subscription required
